name: Emit (Aswin Behera)
description:
Take on a daring Time Heist.
Play against the laws of Nature and grab the thing most valuable in sight.

An isometric survival puzzle where you play as a Horomancer, where you manipulate time to reverse shattered valuables to find prized possessions among the rubble.

Wait, manipulate time? Is Time supposed to do that?

Avoid the red debris and restore objects to restore objects to their former glory.

Controls:

  • WASD - To move
  • SPACEBAR - To reverse time
